educations.title: Institut of Pulp and Paper Industry

given.text:
I worked with Daniel on many web applications. He has excellent interpersonal skills and is easy to work with. His quick understanding of what is needed on the pages and knowledge of the best way to implement it makes him a real pleasure to work with. His design is always beautiful and done in record timing. He has left his mark on every site that he designed.
…
See more

As Creative Director at Coovi, I had the pleasure of working with Daniel for two years. Daniel worked as a senior designer as part of our creative team. He was involved in all aspects of the creative effort relating to web, print, flash and advertising. He is a pleasure to work with, has high ethics and will be a asset to any team. I highly recommend Daniel.
…
See more

I managed Daniel for a number of year on many projects whilst I was a Division Manager at Matrix from 2002 through to 2009. Daniel has a rare combination or great personality, Strong professional skills and an inbuilt exemplary work ethic. Results from Daniels work are on time and at a high quality. I gladly recommend him to any results oriented company.
…
See more

Daniel is professional and highly knowledgeable in his field of expertise. He is sensitive to the clients design requirements and knows how to deliver. He is always ready to help out us and share his skills. It was great working and learning with you. Good luck

Daniel is a very talented and creative Graphic Designer. Because of a lot of experience he gets his job done very quickly and right to the point. All his pages look very Professional, easy to use, with beautiful graphics. He's got skills and passion for what he is doing. He is a very nice and easy going person. And just a Gifted Artist!

I've worked with Daniel both at IDT Maximum Global and at Bituach Leumi, so trust me when I say he's one of the best UI designers in the field. Not only does he know his tools, but Daniel's overall understanding of the "user experience" make him a project asset from the very beginning of the project .

Daniel is an excellent designer. He has experience in designing both application user interfaces, as well as public-facing web sites. Daniel's strength lies in his ability to understand the flow of user experiences in an application and design the UI to accentuate the flows. He also has a knack for presenting information to the user in an intuitive manner which surfaces the critical details first. I would gladly recommend Daniel for a design position, and he would be an asset to any organization.
…
See more

I worked with Daniel recently on a large website that I wrote. Daniel was a pleasure to work with. He provided quality design in a timely manner. He was always available to help with additional design questions and changes. I am sure he will be an asset to any company.

Daniel is one of the most talented people I have ever worked with. It was a pleasure to work with Daniel, and together, we have achieved a lot of success in software projects and products. I wish we will have the opportunity to work together again in the future.

I worked closely with Daniel for 3 years; he is very experienced, professional and talented designer. He has a precise vision how UI should be implemented from users’ point of view and he has huge experience in implementing it. He’s dedicated to his work and very good as a team player. It was a great pleasure to work with Daniel.

Daniel is a talented graphic designer and is a great team player with excellent design and usability skills. I had the pleasure to work with him over the past five years on several different projects.
It was always a pleasure to work with Daniel. He integrates art and technical capabilities seamlessly, and enhances them with creativity and a smile!

received.text: I worked with Hilton on different projects, and even after our professional life went separate ways, I still would refer him some of my clients. Hilton is one of the best in his field, always on time, always precise and professional. I wouldn't think twice and would hire him on the spot.
I had a privilege to work with Shmouel on different projects, and I can highly recommend him as one of the best, creative and passionate designers I've came across!
